text:
Hi, I am YouLiang Jin and I am in Taiwan.
I'm glad to join to the HubSpot Developer Slack.
I feel lucky to be working with great developers here.
As a senior fullstack developer, I am familiar with wide range of programming utilities and languages.
Knowledgeable of backend and frontend development requirements.
Handles any part of the process with ease.
Collaborative team player with excellent technical abilities offering 9 years of related experience.
If you give me a chance to improve your service or business, I will fulfill my job on time and on quality.
Thanks.

NextJS is a SSR framework for React - it doesn't sit on the client unless you expressly tell it to within that environment. HubSpot serves your pages for you, meaning that you don't render your React code on the server and then push to the client. Instead, you can build a SPA on top of a module/template within HS. What errors are you seeing?
